author: Olga Ievdokymenko
title: Announcing strategic partnership with Zack Jackson, the Module Federation inventor
seoDescription: Valor Software Proudly Announces Partnership with Zack Jackson, the Inventor and Co-Creator of Module Federation Aiming to Make Code Sharing More Straightforward and Independent by Popularizing, Enhancing, and Simplifying Implementation of Module Federation for Various Technologies Including Angular.‍ Valor Software, software services and consulting company, creators of ngx-bootstrap led by Dmitry Shekhovtsov, GDE in Angular and web technologies, open-source evangelist, advanced Module Federation practitioner, and Zack Jackson, the Inventor and Co-Creator of Module Federation, maintainer and core contributor to webpack, and a Principal Engineer at Lululemon Athletica, are announcing the beginning of their partnership for the ongoing development support, and implementation of Module Federation, a groundbreaking method of sharing code between and within applications.
